Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 14 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Eye Rays, The Undead Beholder's eyes have become floating eyes around the Death Tyrant, these magical eyes shoot similar but stronger rays as a Beholder
Other Actions.Action 2: Charm Ray, The Death Tyrant attempts to charm a target
Other Actions.Action 3: Paralyzing Ray, The Death Tyrant attempts to paralyze a target
Other Actions.Action 4: Fear Ray, The Death Tyrant attempts to frighten a target
Other Actions.Action 5: Slowing Ray, The Death Tyrant attempts to slow a target, halving their movement speed
Other Actions.Action 6: Enervation Ray, The Death Tyrant blasts a target with a necrotic ray
Other Actions.Action 7: Telekinetic Ray, The Death Tyrant exerts a telekinetic grip on a target
Other Actions.Action 8: Sleep Ray, The Death Tyrant attempts to induce sleep upon a target
Other Actions.Action 9: Petrification Ray, The Death Tyrant blasts a target and begins to petrify them
Other Actions.Action 10: Disintigration Ray, The Death Tyrant blasts a target with a force ray, disintigrating objects and any creature it kills
Other Actions.Action 11: Death Ray, The Death Tyrant blasts a target, either killing them or dealing massive necrotic damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Negative Energy Cone, The Death Tyrant's central eye emits an invisible cone of negative energy which prevents any form of healing.  In addition, it is said that any creature that would die while in the cone is immediatly revived as a zombie under the Death Tyrant's command

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Eye Ray, The Death Tyrant uses any one of its Eye Rays

Lair Actions.Action 1: The Death Tyrant fills a 50ft cube with spectral eyes and tentacles
Lair Actions.Action 2: The Death Tyrant causes spectral appendages to sprout from walls, attempting to grapple any creatures near those walls
Lair Actions.Action 3: The Death Tyrant causes a spectral eye to open in the air and shoots a random eye ray through it, the eye then closes and disappears
